input_args.passage: 'Old-earth or young-earth belief | CMI takes the stand that the creation is thousands of years old, based on straightforward acceptance of the chronology in Genesis.'
input_args.claim: 'Source confirms that Creation Ministries International (CMI) also takes a stand that the creation is thousands of years old, which aligns with the young Earth view, based on a straightforward acceptance of the chronology in Genesis.'
